DOC.brief_summary: Adolescence is the most important period of growth for humans. The conflict and disagreement which exists within family relationships will affect the children behaviors. Family relationships are the cause of many problems in adolescents, to develop a training program on problem-solving skills for adolescent girls to change their relationship with their parents.
DOC.brief_title: Development of Problem-solving Skills Among Female Adolescents by Application of Social Cognitive Theory in Parent-Child Relationship
DOC.criteria: female secondary schools healthy body, not having a psychiatric disorder psychiatric disorder not being volunteer to participate in the present study.
